type: Construction Site Formation and Clearance Work
short_summary: Rehabilitation of the Halfmoon Bay Forestry Road
description: Rehabilitation of the forest service road network to allow for the safe passage of construction equipment for the installation of a new weather radar station.
duration_in_months: Our scope of work includes delivering within this tenure but is dependent on weather conditions. The expected completion duration is around 15 to 20 weeks. With passable weather, a maximum completion duration of 10 weeks is achievable but our normal expectation is around 15 weeks.
